title: HGTV Is A Hit With Affluent Women Viewers
teaser: Meredith Blake of the Los Angeles Times explains the channel's recipe for success, and why it's so popular among affluent women.
contentencoded:
The most popular TV network among affluent women is HGTV. It features a wide array of lifestyle programming like “House Hunters,” “Property Brothers” and “Curb Appeal,” and is a top ten cable network in prime-time.

Meredith Blake of the Los Angeles Times joined Here & Now‘s Jeremy Hobson to explain the channel’s recipe for success.

Guest

  • Meredith Blake, entertainment reporter for the Los Angeles Times. She tweets @MeredithBlake
